sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_06
sentences.sentence: Circumvention is a challenge and it's one of the ways we know that our sanctions are working is that the Kremlin has ordered their intelligence services to design ways to try and get around them.

sentences.sentence: Serbian President Vucic's progressive party celebrated its victory in the parliamentary election. The beaten liberal pro-EU cartel denounced the intimidation of the media and civil rights activists and opponents of the president took to the street claiming the vote was rigged. International election observers weren't able to confirm a systematic electoral rigging by the government, but they seem to agree with the complaints of the opposition.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_07

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: The European Union is investigating the social media platform X

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: over possible breaches of social media law.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It's the first time that the European Commission launches an infringement procedure under its Digital Services Act.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The legislation was approved to create a safer digital space where the fundamental rights of users are protected and to establish a level playing field for businesses.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The opening of proceedings means that the Commission will now investigate X's systems and policies related to certain suspected infringements.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: It has not to judge the outcome of the investigation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The decision was announced on the social media platform itself by Thierry Breton, the commissioner in charge of the EU's internal market.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The investigation will look into whether X, formerly known as Twitter, failed to do enough to curb the spread of illegal content, and also whether measures to combat information manipulation were effective.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The E.U. will also examine whether X was transparent enough on the matter.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has already called out Elon Musk, X's owner, to do more towards eliminating hate speech, misinformation and violent terrorist content related to the war between Israel and Hamas.
